Text:
amlodil is lying on both counts.  

This is a beta version, and you have to enter a beta key during installation.  The uploader has provided the beta key and it works fine.

I just installed this on Windows 7 64bit, registered it with the supplied id and license key, and then updated it to the latest version.  

I haven't started using it yet, but everything seems perfect. 

Thanks uploader!
